title: Ascii Fistbump Challenge
body:
Hey superfriends. Do you like [Ascii art](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ASCII_art) when it's used tastefully? I sure do. Unfortunately I suck at whatever skills it requires to do well, so I have a challenge for you guys: can you create an Ascii fistbump that I (and anyone) can use when it's appropriate?

Here's what I'm looking for...

http://i.imgur.com/CtRJ1be.png

**Edit #1**: I want to see your art posted as a comment in this discussion, not as a text file. Whoever can figure this out in a way that achieves the quality bar I'm looking for will get a treat from me. :)

**Edit: #2**: [Lyrith](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/Lyrith) made the closest to what I'm looking for. Can you do better? Post your attempts in this discussion!

replies.body:
Am I doing it right?

Edit: oops, I found a typo.

I made a quick one, but...
It doesn't like the boards:
That looks an awful lot like the fist bump in the page source ;)
I can't do something like this, but can't you use the letters of Riot to make it? Or would that screw up the black-white balance-thingy?

I could, but people tend to use letters that look like the overall shape to make the picture, in this case "M". The other symbols or letters used (and I notably think I screwed up in some parts) are used to round the shape.
EDIT: Made it slightly better I think.

feel like this can't be done with these forum settings / limitation

Please note everyone that because the Boards is made to adjust the text width on the fly with different resolutions posting stright into the comment is a bad idea. Adding a .txt attachment to your comment is heavily advised. :)

really hope i didn't do a typo… took me 1 hour  45 minutes to do it because i made a typo halfway through and had to fix it. It is too late for me to check it for typos. I just wanted to get it done. 
Edit: Just woke up and found a typo so I am gonna fix it right now.
Edit: I think i fixed it.
I was inspired by LtRandolph's. I couldn't finish because i ran out of text.

http://www.glassgiant.com/ascii/

The Boards really doesn't allow for much variation in ASCII since everything gets pushed to the left.

Are you looking for a .txt file you can add to your posts, or an actual ASCII picture that can be directly posted into a thread?
Another attempt attached
That's sexy.
Attached

1m  
.~

...I don't think it's even close, but I just wanted to try this thing in this style before anyone else does.

"~" for the thumb, "1" for the index finger, and "m" for the three other fingers. "." is nothing but a spacer.

Should do it in notepad and add it as an attachment to your comment.
EDIT: I also tried posting in the board, but it was just clutter so I edited it out and just attached it as a txt.
I tried some more, but it just looks like I'm really bad at the arts of Ascii.

Well, there are plenty of generators out there, but if you want to make one from scratch, here's some tips:
1. Use Microsoft Word, that way you can copy the desired picture into it and set the format to "Behind Text".
2. Pick a simple font like Courier New that has fixed width for all symbols and letters (unless you're extremely advanced).
3. Fill out each object in the picture with a single letter (preferably the same overall shape as the object), be aware that you may need different letters to create color contrast such as between a label on a can of noodles and the actual can.
4. Go back and round out each shape of every object.

NIce art guys. But for the real "artists" out there, I propose an even tougher challenge:

Create the fist bump logo with Perl. (the output should be obvious for those capable of accomplishing this task)

I'll give it a shot for fun. Wish I had known about this thread when it was made! xD
